content.rendered:
manicure + pedicure services

when you come to THE TEN SPOT® for your manicure and pedicure, you can feel confident that your hands look amazing. you know people are thinking — “wow! where did they get that mani pedi?”

at THE TEN SPOT®, we have the best products + services so you feel like the ten you truly are. with a variety of manicure and pedicure services you can get want you want just the way you want it. maybe your looking for extensions that give you the power nails that attract attention, complete with nail art that makes you sparkle when you enter a room. you might want a shellac french manicure or gel overlay nails that keep looking good for what seems like weeks and weeks. or you may prefer to keep things simple by opting for classic polish manicure services or pedicure services. no matter what, we got you.

whatever you choose, at THE TEN SPOT®, you can count on the very best products and nail services that prioritize health and cleanliness. if your nails and cuticles are feeling the stress of today, we’ll help them return to their healthy state so they feel strong and look beautiful.

back to our full service menu

manicure services:

the extensions + the gel BIAB® overlay

these are available at participating bars.

please be sure to book a removal for the extensions, the gel overlay or gel polish if you are wearing any gels at the time of your appointment.

the extensions
95 min.
looking for length? let’s talk about nail extensions. ‘the extensions’ is an awesome alternative to acrylic or apres x nails, adding long-lasting extensions, strength + durability with a non-toxic, vegan + cruelty-free product. it’s chip resistant + highly pigmented + with a long lasting shine and a glass like finish that lasts for weeks.

included: nail shaping + buffing, cuticle work, tip extensions and gel pot overlay + gel color application.

the extensions – fill
80 min.
extensions still looking great but they have grown out a bit? let’s fill them in. we will reduce the top layer and fill them in with the gel pot, giving you a fresh new set.

included: using an e-file we will reduce the top layer, nail shaping, cuticle work, gel pot overlay + gel color application.

the extensions – removal
30 min.
the removal – extensions includes using an e-file to reduce the bulk. we will smooth the natural nail by buffing the remaining gel. we will finish with some nourishing cuticle oil + a stellar nail treatment with our fav 10spot® polish thirsty (aka: the hydrator). this will bring your nails back to their virgin state + contains amino acids to stimulate keratin which will leave your nails feeling super strong. when scheduling a removal, kindly contact us directly to inform us if your extensions were not performed at the 10spot® as this may necessitate additional time and cost allocation for your removal service.

the single tip extension
15 min.
broke a nail? no problem, we can fix that. using the gel bottle’s nail extension we will apply and overlay with hard gel, refine + polish.

the BIAB® gel overlay
80 min.
a non-toxic alternative to dips/acrylic. longer-lasting than other overlays – no chipping or lifting + is designed to keep natural nails strong while promoting better nail health. includes: nail shaping + buffing, cuticle work, application of BIAB™ + gel color application. if you need a fill book ‘the fill – overlay’ and we will get you all filled in!

the BIAB® gel overlay + removal
95 min.
it’s time to remove + get your BIAB® removed + reapplied.

included: removal, nail shaping + buffing, cuticle work, application of BIAB®+ gel color application.

the BIAB® gel overlay – fill
70 min.
have a bit of grow out? ‘the fill – gel overlay’ is for you.

includes: nail shaping + buffing, cuticle work, application of BIAB® + gel color application
*in order for us to monitor the health of your nails we recommend 2 fills max before booking the gel overlay + removal*

the BIAB® gel overlay – removal
20 min.
the BIAB® gel overlay removal, includes finishing with some nourishing cuticle oil + a stellar nail treatment with our fav 10spot® polish thirsty (aka: the hydrator). this will bring your nails back to their virgin state + contains amino acids to stimulate keratin which will leave your nails feeling super strong. when scheduling a removal, kindly contact us directly to inform us if your overlay was not performed at the 10spot® as this may necessitate additional time and cost allocation for your removal service

if you have a gel overlay on please book ‘theBIAB® gel overlay – removal’ service
if you have extensions on (ie: bio gel, sns/dip + acrylic) book ‘the extensions – removal’ service
if you have questions about your removal, contact us.

the gel mani

please be sure to book a gel removal if you are wearing gel polish at the time of your appointment.

the gel mani
40 min.
gel manicures last twice as long as regular polish and dry instantly. includes: nail shaping + buffing, soak, full cuticle work (push back + clipping) + gel polish application. we carry all your fave brands of gel polish, shellac, OPI, the gel bottle and more!

please note if you need a removal please book ‘the gel mani – removal (fingers)’. if you have questions about removal, contact us.

the gel mani + removal
55 min.
remove your old shellac polish + get a full mani with shiny new gel color! price includes a discount on your removal with this killer combo!

the gel polish job
25 min.
got great shape and pretty perfect cuticles, but just need a re-up on the shellac polish? then book this bad boy. includes nail shaping + buffing + gel polish application.

*please note if you need a removal please book ‘the gel polish – removal (fingers)’. if you have questions about removal, contact us.

the gel polish job + removal
40 min.
got great shape + pretty perfect cuticles, but just need a re-up on the gel polish? then this service is for you. includes nail shaping + buffing + gel polish application

*please note if you need a removal please book ‘the gel- removal (fingers)’. if you have questions about removal, contact us.”

the gel polish – removal (fingers)
15 min.
the gel polish removal – we remove your old gel  and finish with some nourishing cuticle oil + a stellar nail treatment with our fav 10spot® polish thirsty (aka: the hydrator). this will bring your nails back to their virgin state + contains amino acids to stimulate keratin which will leave your nails feeling super strong.

please note our the gel polish – removal is only for gel polish (shellac) removals, not for overlay or extension removals. if you have a gel overlay on please book ‘the gel BIAB overlay – removal’ service. if you have extensions on (ie: bio gel, sns/dip + acrylic) book ‘the extensions – removal’ service. if you have questions about removal, contact us.

the regular polish manis

please be sure to book a gel removal if you are wearing gel polish at the time of your appointment.

the mani
30 min.
our manis are the best in the biz. scrub + hot towel, nail shaping + buffing, full cuticle work, hand massage + polish application.
*if you have gel polish on, please book ‘the gel – removal (fingers)’. if you have questions about removal, contact us.

the quickie mani
25 min.
nail shaping + buffing, full cuticle work(push back + clipping + buffing) + polish.

the polish job – fingers
15 min.
nail shaping + polish

add on frenching / nail art

frenching + rainbow nails (aka. diff color on each nail) are available for an additional charge in both regular + gel polish. make sure to book them as they require extra time.
nail art is available in gel only. please contact the location of your choice to book for simple or more advanced nail art – additional pricing will apply

pedicure services:

the gel pedi services

please be sure to book a gel removal if you are wearing gel polish at the time of your appointment.

the gel pedi
50 min.
long-lasting, instantly dry, gel polish. soften your heels + feet, get flawless cuticles + improve your overall foot health. includes; full cuticle work, nail buffing + shaping, buffing, massage, shellac polish application + complimentary toe wax*

*toe wax available at select locations

the gel pedi + removal
65 min.
remove + reapply long-lasting, instantly dry, gel polish. soften your heels + feet, get flawless cuticles + improve your overall foot health. includes; full cuticle work, nail buffing + shaping, buffing, massage, gel polish application + complimentary toe wax*

*toe wax available at select locations

the gel polish – removal (toes)
15 min.
the gel – removal, includes finishing with some nourishing cuticle oil + a stellar nail treatment with our fav 10spot® polish thirsty (aka: the hydrator). this will bring your nails back to their virgin state + contains amino acids to stimulate keratin which will leave your nails feeling super strong.

*the toe waxing service is not available in all usa bars due to licensing limitations. please check with your individual location for details.

the pedi services

please be sure to book a gel removal if you are wearing gel polish at the time of your appointment.

the pedi
45 min.
soften your heels + feet, improve your overall foot health. includes: soak, nail shaping + buffing, full cuticle work, buffing + massaging the feet, polish application + complimentary toe wax *

the quickie pedi
30 min.
soak, nail shaping + buffing, full cuticle work (push back and clipping) + polish. plus your choice of either full callus work or scrub + massage. includes a complimentary toe wax! *

the polish job – toes

15 min.
nail shaping + polish
*if you have gel polish, please book ‘the gel polish – removal (toes)’. if you have questions about removal, contact us.

*the toe waxing service is not available in all usa locations due to licensing limitations. please check with your individual location for details.

kiddie services (aka little ones under 12):

the kiddie manis + pedis

for kiddies 12 years and younger! (provided they fit at our stations)

the kiddie mani
15 min.
nail shaping, scrub, hot towel, massage + polish.

the kiddie pedi
20 min.
soak, nail shaping, scrub, massage + polish.

book now canada
book now usa

faq’s

what's the difference between shellac and regular polish?

shellac lasts longer and is set using light so your polish is totally dry before you even leave the bar! both services will give you gorgeous nails and tidy cuticles.

i already have a mani or pedi do i need to book a removal?

yes please! if you have shellac polish on your fingers or toes, be sure to book a service that includes a removal. it takes a bit longer than regular polish and we want to make sure we have plenty of time to complete the service!

same goes for if you have gel overlay or extensions, the removal is a couple extra steps so be sure to include a removal when you book.

i'm worried about getting some sort of infection!

no infections on our watch! all our bars are #clinciallyclean. we use only stainless steel tools that can be fully sanitized or one time use items that get thrown out after each guest. plus you’ll notice none of our locations have those whirlpool foot baths, you know why? because they are a breeding ground for bacteria! no thanks, we keep things super clean.

back to our full service menu

what are your fave manicure and pedicure services?

yes, we also do gel overlay when you want that amazing look but still want to keep your natural nails at the peak of health. our gel removals at THE TEN SPOT® always include our special hydrating procedure that stimulates keratin to keep your nails healthy and strong. all our manicure and pedicure services follow ultra hygienic cleanliness protocols, so you can feel comfortable knowing that we’ve taken extra steps (steps that a lot of other salons don’t bother with) to stamp out any harmful bacteria to keep you safe.

put your hands in our hands — not to mention your feet, your brows and lashes, your waxing needs, your skin care and facials. because at THE TEN SPOT®, we help you look and feel like a perfect ten.
